restlib.data

Class HttpDate

  • java.lang.Object
    • restlib.data.DateTime
      • restlib.data.HttpDate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<DateTime>

    @Immutable
public final class HttpDate
extends DateTime
    Implementation of DateTime that provides methods to parse and serializers valid HTTP-date strings.

    Note: The current implementation only supports parsing and serializing RFC-1123 compliant date strings. Future revisions may support rfc850 and asctime representations for parsing only.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static HttpDate copyOf(DateTime date)
      Returns an instance of HttpDate that is equivalent to date.
      static HttpDate create(long date)
      Returns an instance of HttpDate wrapping the time specified by date.
      static HttpDate now()
      Returns an instance of HttpDate using the exact current time.
      String toString()
      Subclasses must provide an implementation of toString() that represents the DateTime absolutely in terms of GMT.

        compareTo, equals, hashCode, time

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
